original: @8b / /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽de nas byang chub @9a *//
analyzed: @8b / /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo // de nas byang chub @9a *//
translated: Homage to all the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas.

original: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba'i bla mas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba'i bla mas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the Bodhisattva Mahasattva Jayottama said this to the Blessed One:

original: rgyal ba'i bla ma'i gzungs sngags kyi gzhi 'di gang gis gzung bas chos thams cad gzung ba dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i bla ma'i gzungs sngags kyi gzhi 'di gang gis gzung bas chos thams cad gzung ba dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
translated: by whomsoever these dharani-mantra words of Jayottama are held, all dharmas will be held.

original: mi khom pa brgyad las 'das par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi khom pa brgyad las 'das par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will transcend the eight inopportune states.

original: tshe rabs thams cad du yang gnod sbyin de la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar byed la de la nad thams cad kyis 'jigs pa med do //
analyzed: tshe rabs thams cad du yang gnod sbyin de la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar byed la de la nad thams cad kyis 'jigs pa med do //
translated: In all lifetimes, that yaksha will protect, guard, and conceal them, and they will have no fear of any illness.

original: bo dha ni bo dha ni /🔽sam bo dhi /
analyzed: bo dha ni bo dha ni / sam bo dhi /

original: aa dhi bad bo dha ni /🔽ha la ha la ha la /🔽hi li hi li hi li /
analyzed: aa dhi bad bo dha ni / ha la ha la ha la / hi li hi li hi li /
translated: adhivada bodhani🔽hala hala hala🔽hili hili hili

original: hu lu hu lu hu lu /
analyzed: hu lu hu lu hu lu /

original: sarba buddha / dharma aa ba bo dhi ni /
analyzed: sarba buddha / dharma aa ba bo dhi ni /

original: sphu ta sphu ta sphu ta ni /
analyzed: sphu ta sphu ta sphu ta ni /

original: buddha / aa dhishth'a ne na sv'ah'a /
analyzed: buddha / aa dhishth'a ne na sv'ah'a /

original: 'phags pa rgyal ba'i bla ma'i gzungs rdzogs so //
analyzed: 'phags pa rgyal ba'i bla ma'i gzungs rdzogs so //
translated: The Dhāraṇī of Noble Jina’s Guru is complete.
